actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: A bill entitled, the "International Organization Staffs' Children, Survivors, and Retirees Act of 1985".
short_title: International Organization Staffs' Children, Survivors, and Retirees Act of 1985

summary.text: International Organizations Staffs' Children, Survivors, and Retirees Act of 1985 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to include within the definition of "special immigrant" unmarried sons and daughters and surviving spouses of employees of certain international organizations ("I" status). Grants nonimmigrant status to: (1) parents of children receiving "I" status while they are minors; and (2) other children of such parents or a surviving "I" status spouse.

titles.title: International Organization Staffs' Children, Survivors, and Retirees Act of 1985
A bill entitled, the "International Organization Staffs' Children, Survivors, and Retirees Act of 1985".
